name: sliding
signature: <A>(capacity: number | { readonly capacity: number; readonly replay?: number; }) => Effect<PubSub<A>, never, never>
description:
Creates a bounded `PubSub` with the sliding strategy. The `PubSub` will add new
messages and drop old messages if the `PubSub` is at capacity. For best performance use capacities that are powers of two.
documentation:
Creates a bounded `PubSub` with the sliding strategy. The `PubSub` will add new
messages and drop old messages if the `PubSub` is at capacity.

For best performance use capacities that are powers of two.
